text:
Message 3302 of 4024
I realize that you always try to put our kids in the middle. But that’s not what happened.
But frankly, I do not care . I am asking to work with you. This way is not workable.
Can we please consider Dr. Brown for one appointment?  Please just one.
Sent:06/20/2024 at 05:33 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/21/2024 at 05:19 AM)
Subject:Re: Hangers
Message 3303 of 4024
Please share whatever communication rules are in effect for knowing what the hell is going on with my kids. I had no say in them and I have no idea
how to get in touch with you about my children anymore. Until the law says I am not the father, may I ask that you give some tip of the hat to my
genetic standing?
Sent:06/20/2024 at 05:54 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/21/2024 at 05:17 AM)
Subject:Re: Another Escalation
Message 3304 of 4024
Still asking how I can find out about the health and welfare of my kids while you play games.
Expert Insight: "Effective co-parenting requires open, timely, and respectful communication between both parents to ensure the best outcomes for
their children." - Davidson, H. (2005). The Impact of Domestic Violence on Children: A Report to the President of the American Bar Association.
Research Findings: "Narcissistic parents often manipulate communication platforms to control and limit the targeted parent's involvement,
undermining effective co-parenting and causing emotional distress to the children." - Gottlieb, L. J. (2012). The Parental Alienation Syndrome: A
Family Therapy and Collaborative Systems Approach to Amelioration.
Sent:06/20/2024 at 11:52 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/21/2024 at 05:16 AM)
Subject:Re: Another Escalation
Message 3305 of 4024
Andy’s suggested email protocols I agree are sound. This was form of co parenting you suggested. It’s in his documents. Resharing
I’m discussing with Natalie next week but we can start implementing now.
Sent:06/21/2024 at 05:19 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/21/2024 at 07:58 AM)
Subject:Re: Another Escalation
